include-in-sourceset.documentation: Add additional files to the main smithy source set.

output-directory.documentation: Write Smithy build artifacts to a specified directory.

output-directory-with-config.documentation: Write Smithy build artifacts to a specified directory based on smithy-build settings.

output-directory-with-projection.documentation: Write Smithy build artifacts to a specified directory and generate a projected version of the model.

smithy-build-task.documentation: Build Smithy models using a custom build task.

add-tags.documentation: Add a Smithy tag to the built JAR.

custom-trait.documentation: Add Smithy files defining a to a JAR alongside the Java definition of that trait.

kotlin-jvm-project.documentation: Add Smithy models to a jar created by a kotlin project.

multiple-jars.documentation: Build a Smithy JAR using both the java-library plugin and manually defined tasks.

projection.documentation: Place a projected version of the model into the JAR.

source-projection.documentation: Build a Smithy model and place it in a JAR.
